actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

official_title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the age for receipt of military retired pay for non-regular service from 60 to 55.

summary.text: Reduces from 60 to 55 the minimum age for the receipt of military retired pay for non-regular service.

titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the age for receipt of military retired pay for non-regular service from 60 to 55.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the age for receipt of military retired pay for non-regular service from 60 to 55.
